tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    sent_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    details TEXT,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    collaboration_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE battles (
    battle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    battle_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    collaboration_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player1_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player2_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE battles (
    battle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player1_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player2_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    collaboration_type TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE battles (
    battle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    battle_outcome TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    games_played INT,
    total_wins INT,
    total_losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    item_name TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
